website_summaries.verdict: This electric lighter is great for an emergency kit, since it doubles as a flashlight.
pros: Quick charges in 2 hours, and provides 150 to 300 lights on a single charge
Auto-protect mode ensures lighter doesn't light in  your pocket
Great for lighting in windy conditions
cons: Some users report difficulty recharging over time
Flashlight mode occasionally turns on in a pocket and drains the battery

customer_reviews.title: Overheats, possible fire hazard

We were in the middle of the Pacific on a cruise, so as soon as I was sure the battery was fully discharged, I threw it away.
